faqs.question: Does this app collect any personal data?
faqs.answer: No, we do not collect, store, or share any personal information. The app works entirely online except for storing quotes locally in the app. It does not access your name, email, identity, location data, device identifiers, or usage history.

faqs.question: How are my data and privacy protected?
faqs.answer: All preferences are stored only on your device. No servers, databases, third-party trackers, or analytics are used.

faqs.question: Why does the app connect to the internet?
faqs.answer: To fetch quotes from public APIs. These connections don’t require accounts and only transmit anonymous technical data like your IP address and timestamp, using secure HTTPS protocols.

faqs.question: How does the 'Local Storage' feature work?
faqs.answer: All settings and preferences such as theme, language choices are stored locally on your device. These are deleted when you uninstall the app.

faqs.question: Can I share quotes safely?
faqs.answer: Yes! The 'Copy & Share' feature uses your device’s native sharing menu and doesn’t track what or who you share with.

faqs.question: Is translation available in the app?
faqs.answer: The app uses certified third-party translation services. All translations are processed externally and never stored within the application. No translated text is retained or accessed by our systems.

faqs.question: Where do the quotes come from?
faqs.answer: Quotes are sourced from public APIs such as [FavQs](https://favqs.com) and [Breaking Bad Quotes](https://github.com/shevabam/breaking-bad-quotes), along with other community-maintained repositories.

faqs.question: How often are new quotes added?
faqs.answer: Quotes auto-refresh every when ever you visit the app, and you can manually refresh them at any time.

faqs.question: Are quotes fact-checked or moderated?
faqs.answer: No, quotes reflect original API content and community submissions. We do not curate or modify them.

faqs.question: Is this app GDPR/COPPA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, we fully comply with GDPR (EU) and COPPA (US) regulations. No user data is collected from any age group. We do not target users under 13 (16 in EU).

faqs.question: Why does the privacy policy mention third parties?
faqs.answer: For transparency. Our quote API providers may see your IP address and timestamp during standard web requests.

faqs.question: Quotes aren’t loading. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Check your internet connection, force-close and reopen the app.

faqs.question: How do I reset preferences?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings → Reset All → Confirm. This clears theme/font selections and your favorites list.

faqs.question: How are updates handled?
faqs.answer: App updates are optional and only introduce new features or improvements. Data practices will never change without prior user notice.

faqs.question: Will ads or subscriptions be added?
faqs.answer: No. We have no plans to add ads, in-app purchases, or premium features.

faqs.question: Can I request new quote categories?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can email suggestions to: information.seeker14@gmail.com

faqs.question: How can I Contact for support?
faqs.answer: Email requests to [information.seeker14@gmail.com](mailto:information.seeker14@gmail.com) with 'supprot in Quotes With Vibe' in the subject line.
